official_title: A bill to amend titles XI and XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to provider appeals of adverse determinations by peer review organizations.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) and part B (Peer Review) of title XI of the Social Security Act to entitle Medicare providers to a reconsideration by a peer review organization of that organization's denial of payment for services provided, and to further review where such reconsideration is adverse to the provider and certain jurisdictional criteria are satisfied.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles XI and XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to provider appeals of adverse determinations by peer review organizations.
